comment.author: 22861054@N04
comment._content: If the writing on the left side of the picture can be believed, this was 1 May, 1911. Mrs. Morse died 10 October, 1911. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F02E4DF1E38E633A...

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: the fence and possible racing form indicate they are at a race track, there is an identical fence here [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3047672563/]

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called 1910s Fashion, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: At the Belmont Park race track, on May Day, May 1, 1911.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: B-59: You are correct that Mrs. Tyler Morse died on Oct. 10, 1915 as cited in this article in the New York Times: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00815FE355C13738... We will add more information to the description of the image.
